amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 15 in the Congressional Record of July 10, 1997, to prohibit any funds from being used to evict any person from the property of Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore if that person was authorized, on July 10, 1997, to occupy the property under a lease or permit issued by the Department of Interior.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stupak amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
